Name: Creator Adventure Legend
About the game: Town On this land you will unlock various buildings such as hotels, weapon shops, consumable shops, nurseries Townsman: They can be assigned to build houses, cultivate farmland and raise animals Risker: Will shop in town, strengthen weapons, restore state, or go for a glass of wine, and then go to the dungeon to get materials and money to improve level Residents will get married after a long time together. Of course you can force them to get married, but they may not be willing Residents have maximum Age, and When they exceed the maximum age, they will die,Take care to train their offspring or your town will lose its vitality. Maze You can post missions for a team of adventurers to take you to explore the maze, In the maze you will get a variety of specific items that will make your risker team stronger In the maze you will encounter monsters. They have all kinds of magic. You will kill and get their magic cores or eggs. Workers will use these materials to hatch or resurrect into monsters that listen to you. Placed in the dungeon In the maze you will also encounter humanoid villages, where you can hire or kidnap them, let them join the town. In the maze you can save the trapped travelers and let them join the town. Humanoid Civilians: You can use their abilities to provide you with various resources, such as hatching monsters, alchemy Warrior: You can let them guard your town against foreign invasion You can set up their residence in the town and let them reproduce here Dungeon You can build various dungeons and put in the monsters you want to put in The monsters in the dungeon have no level but only age, and they will become stronger as they grow older, but they will also die if they exceed the maximum age 600+ magic, 1000+ equipment, 400+ Legendary equipment Various monsters, humanoid races, materials, props, alchemy items, food Waiting for your discovery
